Gillian Condy, amụrụ n'ubochí isé n'ọnwa Disemba 1952 Nairobi, bụ onye na-ese ihe ọkụkụ na South Africa

O gosipụtara ihe karịrị efere narị abụọ màkà Flants Flowering Plants of Africa, nyere aka na mbipụta ndị ọzọ dị iche iche nke South African National Botanical Institute na efere asatọ màkà Curtisz Botanical Magazine
O sere ihe osise abụọ nke Charles Craib, Geophytic Pelargoniums (2001) na Grass Aloes in the South African Veld (2005)
O nyekwara aka na ngalaba akụkọ ndụ n'akwụkwọ South African Botanical Art: Peeling back the Petals (2001).
A mụrụ Condy na Kenya, nwa ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụ nwanyị atọ nke Thomas Roy Condy na Phyllis Mary Poulton, ma nọrọ n'oge ọ bụ nwata na Uganda ebe ịhụnanya ya maka Africa na osisi ya bịdọrọ
Ọ natara ọzụzụ ya na Middlesex Polytechnic na London dị ka onye na-ese ihe osise akụkọ ihe mere eme ma nweta nzere Master of Arts na Royal College of Art màkà ọrụ akpọrọ "British Poisonous Plants".
Condy laghachiri Africa site na Phuthadikobo Museum na Mochudi na Botswana na International Volunteer Service ma nọrọ afọ abụọ na-eme ya ihe ike tupu ọ kwaga Lobatse
N'afọ 1983 ọ ghọrọ onye na-ese ihe ọkụkụ na South African National Botanical Institute na Pretoria, ọ lara ezumike nká n'afọ 2018
Ọ nọgidere na-enwe mmekọrịta ya na Botswana site na imepụta stampụ irí na atọ màkà mba ahụ kemgbe afọ 1982.
Royal Horticultural Society enyewo Condy ihe nrite ọla edo ma n'afọ 1990 e nyere ya Jill Smythies Award site na Linnean Society nke London
N'afọ 1992, ọ natara onyinye Beeld Stamp Design of the Year màkà Edible Wild Fruits of Bophuthatswana na nke abụọ na 1993 màkà Acacia Trees
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na mba ụwa n'ihe karịrị ihe ngosi irí isii
O gosikwara na 7th International Exhibit of Botanical Art and Illustration, Hunt Institute for Botanical Documentation na Pittsburgh, USA
N'afọ 2000, e nyere ya ihe nrite ọla edo na Kirstenbosch Exhibition of Botanical Art, Silver sochiri ya n'afọ 2002 na Gold n'afọ 2004.
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2001, e nyere ya Cythna Letty Medal site na Botanical Society of South Africa
N'afọ 2006, o mepụtara stampụ isii màkà South Africa na-egosi ụdị Clivia.
Gillian Condy bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere ndị otu Botanical Artists Association of Southern Africa (BAASA)
Ọ na-eduzi ọmụmụ nka oge niile màkà SANBI na BAASA
A na-ahụ ihe osise ya na Blue Train na nchịkọta gburugburu ụwa.
